descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#6aa84f][size=4]INSTALLATION:
[/size][/color][/b]

[color=#e69138][b]1.[/b][/color][size=3] Copy and paste into your main game folder. Requires skyrim enb series which can be downloaded from http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm[/size]


[color=#e69138]2.[/color][size=3] In your SkyrimPrefs.ini ( C:\Users\username\Documents\My Games\Skyrim) change to:[/size]
[size=3]    bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/size]
[size=3]    bDrawLandShadows=1[/size]
[size=3]    bShadowsOnGrass=1[/size]
[size=3]    bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
[/size][size=2][color=#b6b6b6]
*If you can't find this lines in your ini, just add them under Display section[/color]
[/size]

[color=#e69138]3.[/color][size=3] In your enblocal.ini (x:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Skyrim) change to:[/size]

[size=3]    ReservedMemorySizeMb=x (1GB change to 128, 2-256, 3-512, 4-1024)[/size]
[size=3]    VideoMemorySizeMb=x       according to your video card memory[/size]

[size=2] *Edit enblocal and enbseries inies to enable or disable some of the functions or effects if you can't do this via enb panel (shift+enter)[/size]


[size=3]
For more information please visit: http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB[/size]

[size=3][color=#e69138]4.[/color] Before you start playing, disable game AA and AF via Launcher



[/size]

[b][color=#6aa84f]OPTIONAL:[/color]
[color=#b6b6b6]
[/color][list][*][color=#b6b6b6]To hit a better quality and increase distance view you can add this lines in your skyrim.ini (in the same folder as Skyrim.Pres)
[/color][/*]
[/list][/b][color=#b6b6b6] under [General] section:

uExterior Cell Buffer=144
uGridsToLoad=11
iPreloadSizeLimit=126877696

*note, that this may extremely decrease performance and lower in game frames per second
[/color]
[color=#6aa84f]
[/color][list][*][color=#6aa84f][/color][color=#b6b6b6]If you are not happy with AA edge and prepixel AA you can download a compatibile SMAA implementation from: [/color][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]http://mrhaandi.blogspot.com/p/injectsmaa.html[/size][/color]
[/*]
[/list]



[u][color=#b6b6b6]Some of the mods I use:[/color][/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655]Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268]WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564]SkyFalls and SkyMills - Animated Distant Waterfalls and WindMills[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3288]Lush Trees and Grass[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30971]High Definition Ivy[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers - Nature and Landscape Enhancement[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39450]Real Clouds
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All In One[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/436]HiRes Legible Road Signs
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14308]Riverside Lodge[/url]
author: bury_wilk
